data.title: Radio To Get 6.6% In 2025
data.text:
Radio Ink sent this email to their subscribers on August 7, 2024.

Text-only version of this email

Audio Ads Give Edge As Retailers Sweat Back-to-School Decline, Asset Sales Boost Salem Media Group Into The Black In Q2 Not seeing images in Outlook? Click here for instructions to turn images ON or view HTML version. Radio Ink - Radio's Premier Management and Marketing Magazine Eric Rhoads - Chairman Deborah Parenti - President/Publisher Cameron Coats - Online Editor Lainie Petersen - Magazine Editor Brida Connolly - Managing Editor Forwarded from a Friend? Radio Headlines For Wednesday 08/07/24 Radio Battles For Small Share In BIA’s Full 2025 Local Ad Forecast BIA Advisory ServicesAfter giving a first look during a July webinar, BIA Advisory Services has updated and released its US Local Advertising Forecast, projecting $171 billion in total local media revenues for 2025. The burning question: of that total, what will radio receive? [read more] Audio Ads Give Edge As Retailers Sweat Back-to-School Decline School ShoppingWith current projections showing back-to-school spending down year-over-year as extreme economic uncertainties return to the headlines, research is showing how audio advertisements benefit retailers more than TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube. [read more] Asset Sales Boost Salem Media Group Into The Black In Q2 Salem Media GroupAs the company continues to divest properties during a turbulent year, Salem Media Group has reported a mixed, yet promising, financial performance for Q2 2024, showing a rebound in net income despite a downturn in total revenues thanks to savvy sales. [read more] Criminal Charges Could Be Coming In CapRadio Financial Fiasco CapRadioAs Sacramento's Capital Public Radio releases the results of the latest audit highlighting significant financial mismanagement, it has come to light that the Sacramento County Sheriff’s Office is now involved over vague payments and potential conflicts of interest. [read more] Paige Nienaber’s Midweek Idea Dump: The Impossible Dream Paige Nienaber(By Paige Nienaber) When interviewing people for a Promotion Director job, I always ask, “So what promotion, event, or contest have you always wanted to do?” I think you find that a lot of talented people have dreams or bucket lists. [read more] 10 Ways To Ignite Your Creativity Randy Lane(By Randy Lane) Setting my daily intentions, a brief yoga session, and meditation are habits that kickstart my day. Our habits largely determine who we are and who we become. To be more creative and innovative, practice daily habits that feed your creativity. [read more] ‘I Got This’ Rick Fink(By Rick Fink) If you're watching the Olympics, you may have witnessed one of the games' most anticipated moments: Simone Biles’ return. Her poise and focus on the Olympic stage spoke volumes, but it was some literal speaking she did that caught my attention. [read more] EXPLORE OUR LATEST RESEARCH ON MEDIA TRENDS State of Spanish-language Media 2024: Audio Edition Focus on Spanish-language audio media State of Media 2024 Industry-wide analysis of media trends State of Sports Media - Fall 2023 Key trends in sports media \ hah’ker 0S group MEDI"A BANKRUPTCY COURT AUCTION FOR RADIO STATIONS Date: August 29, 2024 Time: 2:30 PM Pacific Time As is- Where is Auction sales for FCC licensed radio stations and related assets for $275,000. KRLT (FM) and KOWL (AM) South Lake Tahoe, CA Filed Pleadings Detailing Over Bid Procedures, contact Stephen Harris, Esq., [email protected] or (775) 690-9120 cell. Jacobs Media Rolls Out Jacobs D.R. to Enhance Digital Revenue Jacobs DRWith the rapid growth of digital sales within the radio industry, Jacobs Media has introduced Jacobs D.R., a new consulting service tailored to help broadcasters expand their digital revenue streams. [read more] John Goforth Gets Go Ahead To Lead Hubbard’s Podcast Division John GoforthHubbard Radio has appointed John Goforth as its new Vice President/General Manager of Podcasts. Goforth most recently served as Chief Revenue Officer at Magellan AI, with background at HowStuffWorks, iHeartPodcasts, Midroll Media, and CBS Radio. [read more] ‘Ducati’ Wheels His Way Into APD Role At Atlanta’s Kiss 104.1 Dyron “Ducati” WalkerCox Media Group Atlanta has promoted Dyron “Ducati” Walker to the position of Assistant Program Director at Kiss 104.1 (WALR). Walker has been with Kiss 104.1 since 2019, and takes on programming duties to complement his midday on-air show. [read more] Ten Days Left To Nominate Radio’s Best Managers Best Managers LogoAn organization is only as good as the person who manages it - that's why it's so important to Radio Ink that we recognize The Best Managers in Radio each year. If you're led by a visionary who steers their team through radio's brave new world, it's time to nominate. [read more] Beasley Vegas Parts Ways With Music Director Sammi Reeves Sam Nunley HeadshotSam Nunley, known on-air as Sammi Reeves, has been let go from her roles at Beasley Las Vegas Hot AC 102.7 VGS (KVGS), where she was the afternoon host and Music Director. Reeves also filled in as a morning co-host for Aimee+Shawn and worked in production. [read more] Dominic Carter Is The Latest WABC Voice To Get Syndicated Dominic CarterRed Apple Audio Networks is expanding the reach of New York City's 77 WABC political reporter Dominic Carter into syndication. Stations can now receive The Dominic Carter Show twice daily for one-hour shows running in afternoon and late-night slots. [read more] Don't Miss A Detail - Get RBR+TVBR George Kimble has brokered the sale of an FM translator in Toledo, and the buyer has a wider smile. RBR+TVBR's Afternoon Headlines E-mail has the story. What's next? Find out by clicking HERE. Randi West Takes The Mic At Kentucky’s Kiss 96.9 Randi WestLM Communications' Kiss 96.9 (WGKS) in Lexington, KY, is welcoming Randi West to the station's on-air lineup. The Illinois native and veteran broadcaster will handle afternoon drive and Saturdays on the Central Kentucky Classic Hits station. [read more] Spotify Eyes Integration With Google’s Gemini AI Spotify Logo 2023Google's AI, Gemini, may soon feature Spotify integration, allowing users to play music directly through voice commands. Users will be able to request songs on Spotify by using the command "@spotify," followed by their song choice. [read more] Send Radio Ink Your News Tips Radio Ink New Logo fullAre you hearing things about radio in your market? Tell Radio Ink. We've covered radio as the most trusted name in the industry since 1992. Send news tips and station press releases to Radio Ink Online Editor Cameron Coats. [read more] Request your sample copy of Radio Ink today! Update your account info Copyright 2024 Streamline Publishing, Inc. All rights reserved. If you were forwarded this email from a friend or co-worker, hitting the UNSUBSCRIBE link below will end their subscription. Instead, please reply directly to them to request they stop forwarding this publication to you. Sent to: [email protected] Streamline Publishing Inc., 2263 NW 2nd Ave, Suite 207, Boca Raton, Florida 33431, United States
